server.event_manager

Class EventsManagerData

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.event_manager.EventsManagerData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EventsManagerData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Event Manager Data

    This class encapsulates the event management data from the Event Manager class. It offers an interface to the Event Manager class to manipulate the data
    Since:
    27-09-2019
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventsManagerData()
      This constructor creates a new event manager data that can be used by the EventManager class to manipulate the data.

      • createEvent

        public gps.events_information.EnumActionResult createEvent(java.lang.String eventName,
                                                           java.lang.String creator,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> participants,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<gps.events_information.Expense> expenses)
        This method is used to create an event and add it to the database.
        Parameters:
        eventName - - The name of the event
        creator - - The email of the creator of the event
        participants - - A list with the emails of the participants in the event
        expenses - - A list with expenses the event will have in the beginning
        Returns:
        EnumActionResult - The method returns an Enum value informing the success of the operation.

      • editEvent

        public gps.events_information.EnumActionResult editEvent(java.lang.String eventName,
                                                         java.lang.String newName,
                                                         java.lang.String requester,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> participants,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<gps.events_information.Expense> expenses)
        This method is used to edit an event in the database.
        Parameters:
        eventName - - The name of the event to edit
        newName - - The new name of the event
        requester - - The email of the requester of the modification
        participants - - The new list with the emails of the participants in the event
        expenses - - The new list with expenses in the event
        Returns:
        EnumActionResult - The method returns an Enum value informing the success of the operation.

        This method is used to delete an event from the database.
        Parameters:
        eventName - - The name of the event to delete
        requester - - The email of the requester of the deletion to verify if it's the creator of the event
        Returns:
        EnumActionResult - The method returns an Enum value informing the success of the operation.
